document_data.name: Sickle
document_data.mainbody: The '''sickle''' was a farm implement slightly modified and strengthened to make a simple, light melee weapon.
document_data.Description: This weapon was a reinforced form of a farmer's sickle commonly used to harvest grains. It had a handle to which was attached a blade that was curved in more or less a semicircle, coming to a sharp point.
document_data.Usage:
Because of its shape, the sickle could also be used in trip attacks. 

The sickle was preferred by [[druid]]s and by people who wanted to carry a weapon yet remain inconspicuous to guards.
